cheatsheet.title: Create a Test Case to use as an Event Handler

intro.description: The next few steps guide you through the creation of a Test Case which will reset the program if an error occurs. We will use the Test Case as an Event Handler later.

item.title: Create a new Test Case
item.description:
In the Test Case Browser, create a new Test Case.
Name the Test Case:
Reset

item.title: Reference a Test Case to select reset from the menu

subitem.label: Open the Test Case Editor for the "Reset" Test Case.
In the Test Case Browser, open the category: "unbound_modules_concrete/Actions(basic)/Select/Menu Bar"
Drag the Test Case "ub_mbr_selectEntry_byTextpath" with the parameters "[TEXTPATH]" and "[OPERATOR]" into the Test Case Editor for the "Reset" Test Case.
In the properties view, enter the textpath "File.*/reset.*" for the TEXTPATH parameter.
